attributes.action: tell the country the true rate of inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with fuel, food and normal living costs rising so much in the last 12 months, we demand to know the true rate of inflation.  We believe the true figures are being manipulated in order to prevent pensioners getting a realistic inflation-linked pension.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
